briefdescription.para: Get number of items.
Insert an item into a array at a specified position.
Add an item to the end of a array.
Remove item at a specified position.
Remove all items.
Swap items at a specified positions.
Search item, returns the position of the first occurrence in array or ITEM_NONE if item not found.

description.para: Methods used to manipulate item selection.

detaileddescription.para: Get index of selected item (ITEM_NONE if none selected)

description.para: Methods used to manipulate item user data.

briefdescription.para: Replace an item data at a specified position.
Clear an item data at a specified position.
Get item data from specified position.

description.para: Methods used to determine and manipulate item visibility.

briefdescription.para: Move all elements so specified becomes visible.
Move all elements so first becomes visible.
Move all elements so last becomes visible.
Move all elements so selected becomes visible.

detaileddescription.para:
Return true if item visible
_index
of item
_fill
false: function return true when whole item is visible true: function return true when at least part of item is visible

briefdescription.para: Same as ListBox::isItemVisibleAt for selected item.
Set scroll visible when it needed.
Set scroll position.

description.para: Methods used to manipulate the widget's settings.

copydoc.para: Set widget position (position of left top corner)

briefdescription.para: Replace an item name at a specified position.
Get item name from specified position.
Return optimal height to fit all items in ListBox.

detaileddescription.para:
Event : Enter pressed or double click. signature : void method(MyGUI::ListBox* _sender, size_t _index)
_sender
widget that called this event
_index
of selected item

Event : Selected item position changed. signature : void method(MyGUI::ListBox* _sender, size_t _index)
_sender
widget that called this event
_index
of new item

Event : Item was selected by mouse. signature : void method(MyGUI::ListBox* _sender, size_t _index)
_sender
widget that called this event
_index
index of selected item

Event : Mouse is over item. signature : void method(MyGUI::ListBox* _sender, size_t _index)
_sender
widget that called this event
_index
of focused item

Event : Position of scroll changed. signature : void method(MyGUI::ListBox* _sender, size_t _position)
_sender
widget that called this event
_position
of scroll

briefdescription.para: {ListBox} ListBox widget description should be here.
